title: i cant play
body:
i havent played league for 1 day and after i logged into ma acc and clicked on play 5v5 normal summoner's rift and it is not starting i cant join the que
plz fix this

replies.body:
Mastro is the *heartbeat* service that syncs your actions with the server. If you're getting errors connecting to it, then it's likely that your connection to the servers is unstable. Most instability to the server is caused by network settings that conflict with League. As a result, I'd recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
